snippet: Ford Motor Co will increase its global sales to 9.4 million vehicles by 2020 from 6.2 million vehicles in 2013, said Jim Farley, Ford's sales chief....

headline.print_headline: Ford Says It Will Reach Global Sales of 9.4 Million Vehicles by 2020
headline.main: Ford Says It Will Reach Global Sales of 9.4 Million Vehicles by 2020

lead_paragraph: Ford Motor Co will increase its global sales to 9.4 million vehicles by 2020 from 6.2 million vehicles in 2013, said Jim Farley, Ford's sales chief.
